Package ch.teko.game.model

Class Fighter

java.lang.Object
ch.teko.game.model.Entity
ch.teko.game.model.Fighter
public class Fighter extends Entity
The Fighter class represents a player-controlled fighter in a game. It extends the Entity class

  • Constructor Details

    • Fighter

      public Fighter(int x, int y, boolean isPlayer1, String assetsDir)
      Constructs a new Fighter instance, initializing it with the given position, player identifier, and asset directory.
      Parameters:
      x - the initial X-coordinate of the fighter.
      y - the initial Y-coordinate of the fighter.
      isPlayer1 - flag to indicate if this fighter is player 1.
      assetsDir - the directory containing the assets for this fighter.

    • Fighter

      public Fighter(int x, int y, boolean isPlayer1, AssetsManager assetsManager)
      Constructs a new Fighter instance, initializing it with the given position, player identifier, and an existing AssetsManager.
      Parameters:
      x - the initial X-coordinate of the fighter.
      y - the initial Y-coordinate of the fighter.
      isPlayer1 - flag to indicate if this fighter is player 1.
      assetsManager - the AssetsManager managing the fighter's assets.

  • Method Details

    • getAssetsManager

      public AssetsManager getAssetsManager()
      Retrieves the assets manager associated with the fighter.
      Returns:
      the AssetsManager for the fighter.

    • flipAsset

      public void flipAsset()
      Toggles the flipping of the fighter's assets. This is useful for rendering the fighter facing in the opposite direction.

    • getMaxHealth

      public float getMaxHealth()
      Retrieves the maximum health of the fighter.
      Returns:
      the maximum health value.

    • getHealth

      public float getHealth()
      Retrieves the current health of the fighter.
      Returns:
      the current health value.

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Checks if the fighter is dead.
      Returns:
      true if the fighter's health is 0, otherwise false.

    • damage

      public void damage(float damage)
      Reduces the fighter's health by the specified amount of damage.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to inflict on the fighter.

    • onTick

      public void onTick()
      Updates the fighter's state and position on each game tick, adjusting animations, velocity, and ensuring the fighter stays within the map boundaries.
      Specified by:
      onTick in class Entity

    • onRender

      public void onRender(Graphics g)
      Renders the fighter on the screen, including its current animation and hitbox.
      Specified by:
      onRender in class Entity
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object used for rendering.

    • getHitBox

      public Optional<Rectangle> getHitBox()
      Returns the fighter's hitbox if it is in an attack state.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the hitbox Rectangle if the fighter is attacking, otherwise empty.

    • getAABB

      public Rectangle getAABB()
      Retrieves the axis-aligned bounding box (AABB) of the fighter.
      Specified by:
      getAABB in class Entity
      Returns:
      the AABB Rectangle representing the fighter's bounding box.

    • setPositionRelativeToAABB

      public void setPositionRelativeToAABB(int width, int height)
      Adjusts the fighter's position relative to its axis-aligned bounding box (AABB).
      Parameters:
      width - the new X-coordinate of the fighter.
      height - the new Y-coordinate of the fighter.
